title: The Multitinker silent in detail
content:
Frame colour
                            
                            
                                pearl white/black matt*; petrol/black matt*; utility grey/black matt*; utility grey/curry matt*
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Suspension fork
                            
                            
                                Suntour Mobie 34 CGO Boost, 20", 80mm
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Headset
                            
                            
                                Cane Creek ViscoSet
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Seatpost
                            
                            
                                JD/Riese & Müller, Alu, 34,9 x 430mm; By.Schulz G.2 ST*
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Seatclamp
                            
                            
                                JD, 40,0 mm, QR
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Tires
                            
                            
                                Schwalbe Super Moto-X 62-406; Schwalbe 20" Smart Sam Plus 60-406 ECE-R75*
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Tubes
                            
                            
                                Schwalbe AV7
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Rims
                            
                            
                                Mach1 Trucky30 20" CNC
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Spokes
                            
                            
                                Sapim Leader 2,0 mm, Inox, black
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Front hub
                            
                            
                                Novatec Boost Cargo Disc 32H
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Rear hub
                            
                            
                                Shimano Nexus 5-speed, free-wheel, 36L
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Battery
                            
                            
                                Akku Bosch PowerTube 625 Horizontal
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Motor
                            
                            
                                Bosch Performance Line CX (smart system)
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Display
                            
                            
                                Bosch Purion 200; Bosch Kiox 300*; Bosch SmartphoneGrip*
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Crankset
                            
                            
                                FSA/Riese & Müller, 170 mm
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Chain ring
                            
                            
                                63T, for Gates drive belt CDX
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Chain
                            
                            
                                Gates drive belt CDX
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Pinion
                            
                            
                                34T, for Gates drive belt CDX
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Saddle
                            
                            
                                Selle Royal Essenza Moderate 
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Pedals
                            
                            
                                VP R&M Custom
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Shifter
                            
                            
                                Shimano Nexus grip shift, 5-speed 
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Handlebar
                            
                            
                                Satori Horizon, 31,8 mm, 9°, B=620 mm
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Stem
                            
                            
                                Riese & Müller, adjustable height and angle 
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Grips
                            
                            
                                Herrmans Grips Line; Hermans Grips*
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Brakes
                            
                            
                                Magura MT4, disc brake; Magura MT5, disc brake
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Front light
                            
                            
                                Supernova mini 2 Pro
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Tail light
                            
                            
                                Busch & Müller Toplight 2C LED*
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Mudguards
                            
                            
                                SKS A65R; SKS A69R
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Luggage rack
                            
                            
                                Riese & Müller*
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Bell
                            
                            
                                Billy
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Kickstand
                            
                            
                                Kickstand Riese & Müller
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Lock
                            
                            
                                ABUS Shield X+; ABUS Rahmenschlosskette 130 cm*
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                RX Hardware
                            
                            
                                RX Chip (für RX Services)*
                            
                        


                    


                
                    


                        


                            
                                Frame size [cm]
                            
                            
                                universal*

warnings: Specification table may not have proper table structure
